definition: words of the deceased/last words of the dying/wisdom of past sages
to lose/to leave behind/to omit/to bequeath/sth lost/involuntary discharge (of urine etc)

sentences.english: Roh left a suicide note for his family that family lawyer Moon Jae-in handed out to South Korean media.
sentences.chinese: 盧的家庭律師向媒體出示了其自殺前的遺言。

sentences.english: The executor relisting it out loud.
sentences.chinese: 遺言執行人把這段大聲朗誦了進去。

sentences.english: So the husband respected the wife and didn\'t think of remarrying another person.
sentences.chinese: 所以這位丈夫尊重他太太的遺言，沒有動再婚的念頭。

sentences.english: His father's last words clung to his memory.
sentences.chinese: 父親的遺言縈繞在他腦際。

sentences.english: When your lying in your bed, your eulogies been read.
sentences.chinese: 當你臥躺在你的牀上，遺言己經被讀。

sentences.english: These are the last words Zoya said before being killed.
sentences.chinese: 這些話是卓婭被殺之前最後的遺言。

sentences.english: How couId you know Saunière's Iast words?
sentences.chinese: 你怎麼會知道索尼耶赫的遺言？

sentences.english: He uttered his last words and closed his eyes .
sentences.chinese: 他說出了臨終遺言後閉了上眼睛。

sentences.english: So the husband respected the wife and didn't consider of remarrying anotIT person.
sentences.chinese: 所以這位丈夫尊重他太太的遺言，麼有動再婚的念頭。

sentences.english: The dying old man groaned out  his last words.
sentences.chinese: 將死的老人呻吟着說出臨終遺言。

sentences.english: Before she came out, a rabbit entered to hear the last wishes of the king of beasts.
sentences.chinese: 之前，一隻兔子也曾進去聽這獸中之王的臨終遺言。

sentences.english: His last words were "Give my all to Bailie School."
sentences.chinese: 何克生前留下遺言“把我的一切獻給培黎中學”。

sentences.english: His last words is still ringing in my ears.
sentences.chinese: 他最後的遺言依然在我的耳邊不絕如縷。

sentences.english: I want to share that letter with you and your families.
sentences.chinese: 我想與你們和你們的家人一同分享這難忘的臨終遺言。

definition: elder brother/term of respect for a man of about the same age
to bid farewell/to part (usually with little hope of meeting again)
to atone for one's crime/to buy freedom from punishment/redemption/atonement
all one's hopes and efforts come to nothing/futile
approaching one's end/with one foot in the grave
